1.name: Superman
1.description: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

2.name: Grease
2.description: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

3.name: Animal House
3.description: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

4.name: Halloween
4.description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

5.name: The Deer Hunter
5.description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

6.name: Pretty Baby
6.description: A teenage girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.

7.name: Jaws 2
7.description: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

8.name: Midnight Express
8.description: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

9.name: I Spit on Your Grave
9.description: An aspiring writer is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by four men whom she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.

10.name: Up in Smoke
10.description: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

11.name: The Lord of the Rings
11.description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

12.name: Dawn of the Dead
12.description: Following an ever-growing epidemic of zombies that have risen from the dead, two Philadelphia S.W.A.T. team members, a traffic reporter, and his television executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

13.name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
13.description: When seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade a small town, replicating the residents one body at a time.

14.name: The Wiz
14.description: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

15.name: Days of Heaven
15.description: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

16.name: Every Which Way but Loose
16.description: The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe and his pet orangutan Clyde.

17.name: Game of Death
17.description: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

18.name: Starcrash
18.description: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn.

19.name: Watership Down
19.description: A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and protect their new home.

20.name: Convoy
20.description: Truckers form a mile long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff...Based on the country song of same title by C.W. McCall.

21.name: The Driver
21.description: A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.

22.name: Death on the Nile
22.description: As Hercule Poirot (Sir Peter Ustinov) enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

23.name: The Boys from Brazil
23.description: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

24.name: Heaven Can Wait
24.description: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

25.name: Drunken Master
25.description: Wong Fei-Hung (Jackie Chan) is a mischievous, yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents, his frustrated father has him disciplined by Beggar So (Siu Tin Yuen), a Master of drunken martial arts.

26.name: The Wild Geese
26.description: A British banker hires a group of British mercenaries to rescue a deposed African President from the hands of a corrupt African dictator.

27.name: Revenge of the Pink Panther
27.description: To prove that he still is strong and powerful, Philippe Douvier decides to kill Clouseau. Once news of his "death" has been announced, Clouseau tries to take advantage of it and goes undercover with Cato to find out who tried to kill him.

28.name: Force 10 from Navarone
28.description: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

29.name: Coming Home
29.description: A woman whose husband is fighting in Viet Nam falls in love with another man who suffered a paralyzing combat injury there.

30.name: Piranha
30.description: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

31.name: Coma
31.description: When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.

32.name: Quel maledetto treno blindato
32.description: In 1944 France, a group of escaped American military prisoners en route to Switzerland volunteers to steal a Nazi V2 rocket warhead for the Allies.

33.name: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
33.description: In 1964, six teenagers from New Jersey run off to see The Beatles perform on The Ed Sullivan Show (1948) in the hope of meeting their idols. However, they don't have tickets. Along the way, they learn new things about friendship and growing up.

34.name: The Fury
34.description: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from terrorists, who want to use his mental powers for evil.

35.name: Damien: Omen II
35.description: Damien the Antichrist, now thirteen years old, finally learns of his destiny under the guidance of an unholy disciple of Satan. Meanwhile dark forces begin to eliminate all those who suspect the child's true identity.

36.name: Corvette Summer
36.description: A high school grad and a hooker-in-training try to track down his stolen Corvette.

37.name: Autumn Sonata
37.description: A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.

38.name: Goin' South
38.description: Due to the lack of men after the Civil War, a small western town allows a bachelorette with ulterior motives to save a horse thief from the gallows by marrying him. They must deal with his old gang, the Sheriff, the bank, and each other.

39.name: The Buddy Holly Story
39.description: The story of the life and career of the early rock and roll singer, from his meteoric rise to stardom, to his marriage and untimely death.

40.name: Eyes of Laura Mars
40.description: A famous fashion photographer develops a disturbing ability to see through the eyes of a killer.

41.name: La montagna del dio cannibale
41.description: A girl and her brother fly to New Guinea to look for a lost expedition, led by her husband, which has vanished in the great jungle.

42.name: Foul Play
42.description: A shy San Francisco librarian and a bumbling cop fall in love as they solve a crime involving albinos, dwarves, and the Catholic Church.

43.name: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
43.description: Small town band hits it big, but they must battle a nefarious plot in the music industry.

44.name: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes!
44.description: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated killer tomatoes.

45.name: The Great Train Robbery
45.description: In Victorian England, a master criminal makes elaborate plans to steal a shipment of gold from a moving train.

46.name: Hooper
46.description: Hollywood aging stuntman Sonny Hooper wants to prove that he's still got what it takes to be a great professional in this risky and under-recognized line of work.

47.name: Shao Lin san shi liu fang
47.description: A man studies kung fu at the Shaolin Temple to fight back against the oppressive Manchu government.

48.name: Battlestar Galactica
48.description: After the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Mankind, the last major fighter carrier leads a makeshift fugitive fleet in a desperate search for the legendary planet Earth.

49.name: Paradise Alley
49.description: Three Italian-American brothers, living in the slums of 1940's New York City, try to help each other with one's wrestling career using one brother's promotional skills and another brother's con-artist tactics to thwart a sleazy manager.

50.name: Circle of Iron
50.description: A young martial artist embarks on an adventure, encountering other martial artists in battle until one day he meets an aging blind man who will show him the true meaning of martial arts and life.
